data.title: Salvation Films – The Home of Redemption
data.meta_description:
WELCOME TO SALVATION FILMS 
This is the website for Salvation Films and the home of the Redemption, Jezebel and Sacrament film labels as well as the notorious Satanic Sluts     

2024 - Resurrection and Revolution 

2023, while certainly not an annus horribilis, certainly wasn’t the
data.text:
Firstly, our much heralded US range has finally started with the first three titles now available to buy. They are S&M Hunter Begins, Sexy S.W.A.T. Team and Far from the Apple Tree. Followed shortly by Phantasmagoria, Uncle’s Paradise and Nude for Satan.

Still in the US, several of our Jean Rollin titles have been licensed to Shudder, so expect Rollin’s unique take on the vampire to reach more of the uninitiated over the coming months.

Speaking of Rollin, our licensing deal with Indicator is seeing many of the titles in our catalogue remastered in 4K, which, over time, will include all of the Jean Rollin films, including obscurities like Killing Car, The Sidewalks of Bangkok and, amazingly, La Comtesse IXE in all its hardcore glory; something we would have deemed nigh impossible a few years ago!

In the UK we have a truly incredible mix of Pinku, porn, exploitation, sleaze and horror lined up for 2024, including Mask, the Kekko Reborn, Prison Heat, Bloodlust, The Woman Who Sells Pro-biotic Drinks, Nipples, Space Necronomicon, Black Mass of the Brain, Snow Woman, Silence of the Sushi Rolls and many, many more.

Last month we announced that the bad girls of Saint Judith’s Borstal had been recalled from parole and locked up at number 1. Well, they are still there, getting spanked, disciplined and occasionally seduced around the clock. If you are one of the few people in the UK who hasn’t seen this tale of carnal criminality and chastisement, Dana Vespoli’s, Borstal Bitches, the torrid tale of a politician’s daughter who is sent to Saint Judith’s Borstal as punishment for crashing her car while drunk, is number one for another yet month. If you’re wondering what all the fuss is about it centres on the disciplining of Harley by the sadistic Mona (Mona Wells) and her team of ‘instructors’. Featuring lashing of lesbian sex and quite a lot of spanking this torrid tale of tanned bottoms and coercive sex has proved to be a massive hit with Salvation fans. Expect to see more action like this in the form of Prison Heat which is finally released in a few weeks, having been held up in the justice system for months!

Still at number 2 is another Salvation favourite, Ricky Greenwood’s nunsploitation epic, Confessions of a Sinful Nun 2 – The Rise of Sister Mona, which stars the gorgeous Charlotte Stokely, who is also featured in the soon-to-be-published third issue of SALVATION magazine, where she is interviewed exclusively by us.

At number 3 is Twilight Dinner, a rare Pinku title that mixes eroticism and horror and features some incredibly bloody sequences mixed with strong sex scenes, a combination that has made this film incredibly successful. Number 4 is yet another Ricky Greenwood title, this time the salacious tale of cloistered nuns and sapphic passion, Confessions of a Sinful Nun, which along with its sequel at number 2, are two of Redemption’s most popular titles. Girls of Wrestling, another Ricky Greenwood title is also back in the charts at number 5 and features some of the sexiest female wrestlers around, so you can expect to see lots of girl-on-girl action on and off the mat in this epic release.

At the number 6 and 7 positions are two more Pink Cinema titles, the first of these is Yukio Kitazuwa’s madcap sci-fi tale Deep Contact. With a comet on a collision course with Earth a group of scientists work on ways to save mankind, by developing a special psychic power called Sexual Psychokinesis; psychic powers which are unleashed when two psychic people have sex. Can they save Earth from Armageddon? Watch it and find out! The second title, taking number 7 in the charts is Yutaka Ikejima’s extraordinary over-the-top Pinku sex comedy, Japanese Wife Next Door 2. In this tale a businessman who has decided to get married meets two women one is very rich while the other is more homely. He decides to marry the rich one which is a big mistake as she turns out to be mad, a nymphomaniac and from a family of sadomasochistic sex maniacs!

There is more sex action at number 8, though this time it’s of a sapphic nature in Elsa Jean’s sizzling coming-of-age drama, Becoming Elsa, in which the gorgeous Elsa gets intimate with her new all-female house-mates and learns all about life in the big city.

Number 9 is the mischievously titled Milk the Maid which is, despite its name, not a film about a lactating maid, but rather a Pink film centred on a woman called ‘Milk’. Directed by Mototsugu Watanabe and starring the curvaceous adult actress Tia Bejean as Milk who is befriended by a family when send is found wandering in the street. At first, they think she is a lunatic when she claims to be a ‘baby angel’ who must perform good deeds to get her wings. This being a Pinku title the deeds Milk performs are sexual and performed with gusto!

Finally at number ten is Diary of a Secretary starring our favourite curvy star, Roberta Gemma, caught up in a world of secrets and desires.

RedemptionTV.net continues to grow with streams coming in from all over the world, which perhaps explains why this chart is so eclectic and hard to predict from month to month.

For the first time a Satanic Sluts title, The Black Order Cometh, is number 1. Featuring a whole bevvy of Satanic Sluts acting out some of their darkest fantasies in a series of short films, The Black Order Cometh was the first of our Satanic Slut videos so it is exciting to see that there is still enough interest in our dark legion of gorgeous, gore loving, goth girls to get this title up to the number 1 slot.

While new in at number 2 is a scorchingly hot J-Girl Yummy title featuring the diminutive Japanese pornstar Alice Toyonaka, posing in (and out) of a variety outfits, and writhing for the camera. There’s more erotica at number 3 where stunning Hungarian model Brigitta Bulgari shows us just how she got to the top in Fashion.

Back in the charts again is one of our perennial favourites, Renato Polselli’s outrageous and delirious masterpiece of erotic horror, Black Magic Rites (Riti, magie nere e segrete orge nel Trecento… aka The Reincarnation of Isabel). Centred on a group of Satanists who plan to resurrect the witch Isabel, who was burnt to death 600 years before; this film just has to be seen to be believed.

Rounding off Redemption TV’s chart is Jason Impey’s disturbing Hatred, a contemporary tale of a woman, Nurse Meow who turns down a man’s unwelcome advances she finds that a man scorned can be as furious as any scorned woman. But he’s about to find out that this is one kitty that won’t be domesticated.
